element.name: TDOMProcessingInstruction
element.short: Implements the DOM ProcessingInstruction interface from the DOM specification.

descr.p: TDOMProcessingInstruction is a TDOMNode descendant that implements the DOM ProcessingInstruction Interface from the DOM specification. TDOMProcessingInstruction provides access to an XML Processor-specific instruction that occurs in a DOM Document.

TDOMProcessingInstruction provides overridden methods used as the read and write access specifiers for the DOM Node specialization. It also contains properties needed to represent the Target and Data for the DOM ProcessingInstruction.

element.name: TDOMProcessingInstruction.GetNodeType
element.short: Gets the value for the NodeType property.

element.name: TDOMProcessingInstruction.GetNodeType.Result
element.short: Value for the NodeType property.

element.name: TDOMProcessingInstruction.GetNodeName
element.short: Gets the value for the NodeName property.

element.name: TDOMProcessingInstruction.GetNodeName.Result
element.short: Value for the NodeName property.

element.name: TDOMProcessingInstruction.GetNodeValue
element.short: Gets the value for the NodeValue property.

element.name: TDOMProcessingInstruction.GetNodeValue.Result
element.short: Value for the NodeValue property.

element.name: TDOMProcessingInstruction.SetNodeValue
element.short: Sets the value for the NodeValue property.

element.name: TDOMProcessingInstruction.SetNodeValue.AValue
element.short: New value for the NodeValue property.

element.name: TDOMProcessingInstruction.CloneNode
element.short: Makes a copy of the DOM Node.

element.name: TDOMProcessingInstruction.CloneNode.Result
element.short: DOM Node created in the method.

element.name: TDOMProcessingInstruction.CloneNode.deep
element.short: True if child nodes are recursively copied in the method.

element.name: TDOMProcessingInstruction.CloneNode.ACloneOwner
element.short: Document which owns the cloned processing instruction node.

element.name: TDOMProcessingInstruction.Target
element.short: Represent the Target for the DOM ProcessingInstruction node.

element.name: TDOMProcessingInstruction.Data
element.short: Contains the Data for the DOM ProcessingInstruction node.

element.name: TAttrDefault
element.short: Enumerated type with methods for getting the attribute node value.

descr.p: TAttrDefault is an enumerated type with values which indicates how the value for a default attribute node was specified. TAttrDefault is the type used to implement the Defaultproperty in TDOMAttrDef.

element.name: TAttrDefault.adImplied
element.short: Attribute value is implied.

element.name: TAttrDefault.adDefault
element.short: Attribute value is the default.

element.name: TAttrDefault.adRequired
element.short: Attribute value is required.

element.name: TAttrDefault.adFixed
element.short: Attribute value is fixed.

element.name: TDOMAttrDef
element.short: Implements the default attribute node introduced in DOM Level 2.

descr.p: TDOMAttrDef is a TDOMAttr descendant which implements the default attribute node as specified in the DOM Level 2 specification. A default attribute is associated with an Element of a given type in a Document Type Declaration (whether internal or external). It can have a value which is either explicitly specified, implied from the DTD, or fixed to given value. Its value can also be limited to only those values specified in the attribute definition.

TDOMAttrDef is the type returned from the TDOMDocument.CreateAttributeDef method. It is also used to update attribute value for an Element in methods like: TDOMNamedNodeMap.RestoreDefault and TDOMElement.AttachDefaultAttrs.

element.name: TDOMAttrDef.AddEnumToken
element.short: Adds the specified value to the allowed values for the attribute node.

descr.p: Checks existing values in the enumeration to prevent duplicates. The return value is False if Buf already exists in the enumeration.

element.name: TDOMAttrDef.AddEnumToken.Result
element.short: True if the value was successfully added in the method.

element.name: TDOMAttrDef.AddEnumToken.Buf
element.short: DOMPChar value added to the enumeration.

element.name: TDOMAttrDef.AddEnumToken.Len
element.short: Length of the value in Buf.

element.name: TDOMAttrDef.HasEnumToken
element.short: Checks whether the specified value is one of the allowed values for the attribute.

element.name: TDOMAttrDef.HasEnumToken.Result
element.short: True if the specified value exists the enumeration values.

element.name: TDOMAttrDef.HasEnumToken.aValue
element.short: Value to locate in the enumeration.

element.name: TDOMAttrDef.CloneNode
element.short: Makes a copy of the attribute node with the specified owner document.

descr.p: CloneNode is an overloaded, overridden method in TDOMAttrDef used to make a copy of the default attribute node using the specified owner document. CloneNode calls the inherited method on entry, and ensures that the node Flags include the value nfSpecified.

element.name: TDOMAttrDef.CloneNode.Result
element.short: DOM node created in the method.

element.name: TDOMAttrDef.CloneNode.deep
element.short: True if child nodes are recursively copied in the method.

element.name: TDOMAttrDef.CloneNode.ACloneOwner
element.short: Document which owns the cloned DOM node.

element.name: TDOMAttrDef.Default
element.short: Indicates the origin of the value in the attribute node.

descr.p: Default is a TAttrDefault property which indicates how the NodeValue for the attribute node was derived. It contains a value from the TAttrDefault enumeration, and allows values like:

dl.dd: Attribute value is implied in a DTD.
Attribute value is the default value from the DTD.
An Attribute value is required.
Attribute has a fixed value provided in the DTD.

descr.p: The property value is used in methods like TDOMNamedNodeMap.RestoreDefault and TDOMElement.AttachDefaultAttrs.

element.name: TDOMAttrDef.ExternallyDeclared
element.short: Indicates if the attribute was declared in an external subset of the DTD.

descr.p: ExternallyDeclared is a Boolean property which indicates if the attribute is declared in an external subset of the DTD in the owner document.
Tag is a Cardinal property.

element.name: PExtent
element.short: Pointer to a TExtent type.

element.name: TExtent
element.short: Record type with a pointer to its extent, followed by an array TDOMNode instances.

element.name: TExtent.Next
element.short: Pointer to the next extent in a Node pool.

element.name: TNodePool
element.short: Provides custom memory management when DOM Nodes are created.

descr.p: TNodePool is a class used to provide custom memory management when DOM nodes are created in a DOM document. Each TNodePool instance manages objects with the same instance size (and may be a different class types). TDOMDocument provides an internal array of TNodePool instances that are maintained when DOM nodes are created in its Alloc method.

element.name: TNodePool.AddExtent
element.short: Allocates a new extent with the specified number of storage slots.

errors.p: Raises an EAssertionFailed exception for the following conditions:

ul.li: The current extent does not have any allocated storage.
The array of node instances exceeds the available size for the current extent.
The element count argument is zero (0).

errors.p: Calls GetMem to reserve the amount storage indicated by the AElemCount argument and the element size specified in the constructor. AddExtent switches the node pool to the newly allocated extent prior to exiting from the method.

element.name: TNodePool.AddExtent.AElemCount
element.short: Number of storage slots to reserve in the new extent.

element.name: TNodePool.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Allocates an extent with the specified number of entries when the node pool is created.

element.name: TNodePool.Create.AElementSize
element.short: Size for the class instances stored in the node pool.

element.name: TNodePool.Create.AElementCount
element.short: Number of storage slots for nodes in the node pool.

element.name: TNodePool.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

element.name: TNodePool.AllocNode
element.short: Creates a new DOM node instance and stores it in the node pool.

element.name: TNodePool.AllocNode.Result
element.short: DOM node instance created and stored in the node pool.

element.name: TNodePool.AllocNode.AClass
element.short: Class reference used to create the DOM node instance.

element.name: TNodePool.FreeNode
element.short: Frees the specified DOM node and removes it from the node pool.

element.name: TNodePool.FreeNode.ANode
element.short: DOM node freed and de-allocated from the node pool.

element.name: PNodePoolArray
element.short: Pointer to a TNodePoolArray instance.

descr.p: PNodePoolArray is a Pointer to the TNodePoolArray type. It is used to implement the internal node pools in TDOMDocument.

element.name: TNodePoolArray
element.short: Implements an array of TNodePool instances.
Specifies an array of TNodePool instances.

descr.p: TNodePoolArray is an array type which contains TNodePool instances in its elements. The number of elements in the array is defined using:
A Pointer to TNodePoolArray is the type used to implement the internal node pools in TDOMDocument.

element.name: stduri_xml
element.short: Namespace URI for the xml prefix.

descr.p: stduri_xml is a DOMString constant that contains the Namespace URI bound to the xml Namespace prefix. stduri_xml and stduri_xmlns are used to set the default Namespaces prefixes and URIs in TDOMDocument:

element.name: stduri_xmlns
element.short: Namespace URI for the xmlns prefix.

descr.p: stduri_xmlns is a DOMString constant that contains the Namespace URI bound to the xmlns Namespace prefix. stduri_xml and stduri_xmlns are used to set the default Namespaces prefixes and URIs in TDOMDocument:

element.name: StrToXMLValue
element.short: Converts a string to it representation as XML character data.

descr.p: StrToXMLValue is a String function used to convert the value in s to its representation as valid XML character data. The XML specification has five "predefined entities" that represent special characters. StrToXMLValue ensures that any of these characters in s are converted to their representation as a Character Entity, including:
StrToXMLValue also ensures that any NULL character values (Decimal 0) in s are removed.
No actions are performed in the method when s is an empty string ('').
Use XMLValueToStr to convert XML character data to its representation as a String data type.

element.name: StrToXMLValue.Result
element.short: XML character data for the specified value.

element.name: StrToXMLValue.s
element.short: Values to convert to XML character data.

element.name: XMLValueToStr
element.short: Converts XML character data to its representation as a string value.

descr.p: XMLValueToStr is a String function used to convert the XML character data in s to its representation as a string data type. The XML specification has five "predefined entities" that represent special characters. XMLValueToStr ensures that any of these character entities in s are converted to their plain string representation, including:
XMLValueToStr also ensures that any NULL character values (Decimal 0) in s are removed.
No actions are performed in the method when s is an empty string ('').
Use StrToXMLValue to convert a string data type to its representation as XML character data.

element.name: XMLValueToStr.Result
element.short: Plain string representation for the XML character data.

element.name: XMLValueToStr.s
element.short: XML character data to convert in the method.

element.name: EncodeLesserAndGreaterThan
element.short: Converts instance of the reserved characters.

descr.p: EncodeLesserAndGreaterThan is a String function used to convert instances of the reserved characters in s. EncodeLesserAndGreaterThan is similar to StrToXMLValue, but handles only the '<' and '>' characters, or NULL (Decimal 0) byte values in the string. No actions are performed in the routine when s is an empty string (''). The return value reflects the string value after conversion.

element.name: EncodeLesserAndGreaterThan.Result
element.short: Converted values from the function.

element.name: EncodeLesserAndGreaterThan.s
element.short: Values to convert in the routine.
